'''Cerberus''' is a three-headed dog-like creature that appears in the [[Minecraft Mini-Series]] and resides in the Maze of the Minotaur.

== Appearance ==

Resembling the [[wither]], Cerberus has a purple skeleton instead of a normal body, from which extend 3 purple dog heads with pale pink eyebrows, ears and red eyes.

== Biography ==
In 4 Episode of Season 2, after [[Quinn]], [[River]], [[Durango]] and [[CommuniKate]] made it through the maze, they briefly encountered the Cerberus, as well as [[Cyclops]] and [[Minotaur]], but as they prepared to attack, [[Zed]] dug a large hole underneath them, causing the Minotaur and Cyclops to fall into it while Cerberus flew away.
The trio also appeared in Season 2, Episode 8, when [[CommuniKate]] tried to stop the Command Block Statue from self-destructing.

== Power and Abilities ==
The series does not show his abilities, but he presumably has great strength, durability,speed and can shoot by his heads.
